paper.title: Secure circuit evaluation

author.org: DEC Systems Research Center, Palo Alto, U.S.A.
AT&T Bell Labs, Murray Hill, U.S.A.

paper.abstract: We present a simple protocol for two-playersecure circuit evaluation. The protocol enables players C and D to cooperate in the computation off(x) while D conceals her datax from C and C conceals his circuit forf from D. The protocol is based on the technique ofhiding information from an oracle [AFK].
